home.title: Crafting Digital Excellence
home.description: Your main terminal for professional web development services. We build pixel-perfect solutions in a retro style. From command-line interfaces to full applications - we turn your vision into reality.

webdev.title: Website Design & Development
webdev.desc: Custom websites built with modern technologies like React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript or TypeScript. From static websites to full-stack applications, we code with precision and performance in mind.

frontend.title: Frontend Development & UI/UX Design
frontend.desc: Interactive and responsive user interfaces with a retro terminal feel. Pixel-perfect, designed to engage your users.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.desc: Robust server-side solutions with database integration and API development. Hosting websites on paid and free servers.

mobile.title: Mobile-First Design
mobile.desc: Websites optimized for mobile devices with touch-friendly interfaces, responsive and fast.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.desc: Fast-loading websites with optimized code and modern practices.

design.title: Logo Creation & Design
design.desc: Professional logo design and brand identity creation.

packages.title: Basic Website Package
packages.description: Essential web presence for startups and personal projects in retro style and modern functionality.

packages.title: Business Website Solution
packages.description: Comprehensive solution for growing businesses needing dynamic content.

packages.title: E-commerce Platform
packages.description: Full-featured online store with secure payment processing.

packages.title: Custom Web Application
packages.description: Tailored software development for unique business and personal requirements.
